numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Women contact their parents more often than men.
2. The most common way of communication is text.
3. There is a disparity between the percentage of men who contact their parents and the percentage of women who contact their parents.
4. I wonder why this disparity exists.
5. I wonder to what extent gender roles influence this disparity.
6. I wonder whether men have more strained relationships with their parents than women.
7. I wonder whether men have more distant relationships with their parents than women.
8. I wonder whether this disparity is a gender difference that results from socialization.
9. This topic relates to me and my community.
10. I will soon be a young adult.
11. My peers will soon be young adults.
12. During this time, we will become more independent from our parents.
13. Some of my peers will move out.
14. Some of my peers will be at home less often because of college.
15. Some of my peers will be at home less often because of work.
16. Our lives will become busier.
17. If our lives become busier, contact with our parents might be less.
18. It is important that we try to maintain contact with our parents.
19. We can be busy.
20. Even if we are busy, we should try to maintain contact with our parents.
21. Our time with our parents is limited.
22. The headline is: Keeping Parental Contact in Adulthood.
